aboutUs.p: I am from Indonesia and I have worked as a Wordpress Freelancer and Front End Developer for more than 4 years.
Before freelancing, I was a writer on my blog specializing in tech and tutorials for over 6 years before focusing on freelancing.
I am also the founder of RaVsign which aims to accommodate all my work in the fields of Web Development, Illustrator, Ui/UX Design and also as my company name in the future.

content.summary: A dedicated product design team can help you achieve your business goals. Whether you need to craft an idea for a completely new product or elevate the quality of an existing solution, we'll help you to create a product that is laser targeted to your users' needs and delivers business results.

whyMeData.title: Fast
whyMeData.content: I am fast in completing work according to a predetermined schedule.

whyMeData.title: Guarantee
whyMeData.content: I guarantee that every job I do will be optimal and satisfying. If you are not satisfied? I am ready to discuss with you to improve it until you are completely satisfied.

whyMeData.title: Favourite
whyMeData.content: During my time as a Freelancer, my clients are very happy with the work I do.
